item.title: Update 1.2.0 released
item.description:
• Join and leave messages
  • /settings command. Options include:
    • Images can be hidden until clicked
    • Words can be blacklisted
    • Classic background
  • >add greentext
  • Polls now get pronounced
  • Touchscreen dragging is less janky

item.title: Update 1.1.0 released
item.description:
Small little update. This should hopefully make it feel 10x less janky for now
  • Added changelog
  • Fixed stray pixels appearing in certain hats
  • Images no longer break chat log scrolling
  • Added /color cyan and /color yellow
  • Added /hat tophat
  • Fixed automatic rejoining
  • Added /bass to right click
  • URLS will be automatically linked.
  • You can use \n in a message to create a newline.
